name: Flashback Grounding Methods
description: Techniques to anchor oneself in the present moment and disrupt emotional flashbacks.

cards.title: 5-4-3-2-1 Method
cards.description: Using the five senses to pull oneself back into the present moment.
cards.bulletpoints: Identifying 5 sights, 4 sounds, 3 touches, 2 smells, 1 taste

cards.title: Breath Control and Body Awareness
cards.description: Using controlled breathing and physical movement to regain stability.
cards.bulletpoints: Box Breathing, Progressive Muscle Relaxation, Somatic Scanning

cards.title: Physical Movement as a Reset
cards.description: Using rapid physical motion to break the flashback state.
cards.bulletpoints: Jumping, Clapping, Spinning, Sudden Change of Posture
